text:
American Express, Serve @ Tampa bay area (the other bay area) We are trying to transform the Serve division into a nimble, agile SV like company. We have the following positions open. We work on C#, Java and a bunch of other technologies. Come and join us!

* Programming languages - C#, Java * Platform - Windows, .Net, Linux * Database - Oracle, Mysql
